SQL.LOAD: select file_processed_id, file_type, company_group_id, company_id, dealer_id, reference_id, file_name, received, counted, rejected, validated, bypassed, loaded, layout, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, country_id from elp_file_processed where file_processed_id = :file_processed_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select x.file_processed_id, x.file_type, x.company_group_id, x.company_id, x.dealer_id, x.reference_id, x.file_name, x.received, x.counted, x.rejected, x.validated, x.bypassed, x.loaded, x.layout, x.created_by, x.created_date, x.modified_by, x.modified_date, x.country_id, x.status, x.status || decode(x.error_message, null, null, ' : ' || x.error_message) || decode(x.description, null, null, ' : ' || x.description) status_desc from (select fp.file_processed_id, fp.file_type, fp.company_group_id, fp.company_id, fp.dealer_id, fp.reference_id, fp.file_name, fp.received, fp.counted, fp.rejected, fp.validated, fp.bypassed, fp.loaded, fp.layout, fp.created_by, fp.created_date, fp.modified_by, fp.modified_date, fp.country_id, isw.status, isw.error_message, isw.description, row_number() over (partition by fp.file_processed_id order by nvl(isw.modified_date, isw.created_date) desc) rk from elp_file_processed fp left outer join elp_interface_status_wrk isw on isw.file_id = fp.file_processed_id where (:company_group_id is null or fp.company_group_id = :company_group_id) and (:company_id is null or fp.company_id = :company_id) and (:dealer_id is null or fp.dealer_id = :dealer_id) and (:country_id is null or fp.country_id = :country_id) and fp.reference_id = :reference_id and fp.file_type = :file_type ) x where x.rk = 1 order by x.created_date desc, x.file_name desc
